LanguageData.GR_NitroMilkTrap.label: IED nitromilk trap
LanguageData.GR_NitroMilkTrap.description: A bucket of Muffalope milk connected to a homemade battery and electrodes. When the trigger is disturbed, an electrical current excites the unstable milk, and the device explodes. The improvised trigger has a random delay that might allow a nimble enemy to escape.
LanguageData.GR_NitroMilkTrap_Blueprint.label: IED nitromilk trap (blueprint)
LanguageData.GR_NitroMilkTrap_Frame.label: IED nitromilk trap (building)
LanguageData.GR_NitroMilkTrap_Frame.description: A bucket of Muffalope milk connected to a homemade battery and electrodes. When the trigger is disturbed, an electrical current excites the unstable milk, and the device explodes. The improvised trigger has a random delay that might allow a nimble enemy to escape.
